trans-unit.source: Represents a User Defined Type (UDT) that is to be included in the service contract.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个要包括到服务协定中的用户定义类型 (UDT)。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The COM+ integration runtime creates services by inspecting the type library.
trans-unit.target: COM+ 集成运行时通过检查类型库来创建服务。

trans-unit.source: When a COM+ component contains methods that pass a `VARIANT`, the system cannot determine the actual types to be passed prior to runtime.
trans-unit.target: 当 COM+ 组件包含传递 `VARIANT` 的方法时，系统将无法确定要在运行时之前传递的实际类型。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you attempt to pass a User Defined Type (UDT) within a `VARIANT`, it fails because it is not a known type for serialization.
trans-unit.target: 因此，当您试图在 `VARIANT` 内传递用户定义类型 (UDT) 时，将由于该类型不是可供序列化的已知类型而失败。

trans-unit.source: To circumvent this problem, you can add the UDTs to the configuration file so that they can be included as known types on the appropriate service contract.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免此问题，可以将 UDT 添加到配置文件，以使 UDT 作为已知类型包括到相应的服务协定中。

trans-unit.source: In order to do so, you have to uniquely identify the UDT and the contract(s), that is, the original COM interface(s) that uses it.
trans-unit.target: 为此，必须唯一地标识 UDT 和协定（即使用它的原始 COM 接口）。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates adding two specific UDTs to the <`userDefinedTypes`> section of the configuration file for this purpose.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示将两个特定的 UDT 添加到配置文件的 <`userDefinedTypes`> 节，以便达到此目的。

trans-unit.source: The attributes of the <`userDefinedType`> element are defined as follows:
trans-unit.target: 属性 <`userDefinedType`> 元素定义，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: `typeName`: an optional attribute that provides the readable type name.
trans-unit.target: `typeName`：一个提供可读取的类型名称的可选属性。

trans-unit.source: This is not used by the runtime but helps a reader to distinguish the types.
trans-unit.target: 运行库不使用该属性，但该属性可以帮助读取器区分类型。

trans-unit.source: `typeLibID`: a GUID string that specifies the registered type library that defines the type.
trans-unit.target: `typeLibID`：一个 GUID 字符串，指定定义该类型的已注册类型库。

trans-unit.source: `typeLibVersion`: a string that specifies the type library version that defines the type.
trans-unit.target: `typeLibVersion`：一个字符串，指定定义该类型的类型库版本。

trans-unit.source: `typeDefID`: a GUID string that specifies the specific UDT type within the registered type library.
trans-unit.target: `typeDefID`：一个 GUID 字符串，指定已注册类型库中的特定 UDT 类型。

trans-unit.source: When the service is initialized, the COM+ integration runtime looks up the specified types and adds them to the known types collection for the specified contracts.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化服务时，COM+ 集成运行时会查找指定的类型，然后将这些类型添加到指定协定的已知类型集合中。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates adding two specific UDTs to the <`userDefinedTypes`> section of the configuration file for this purpose.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示将两个特定的 UDT 添加到配置文件的 <`userDefinedTypes`> 节，以便达到此目的。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ComUdtElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ComUdtElement" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ComUdtElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ComUdtElement" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A GUID string that identifies the specific UDT type within the registered type library.
trans-unit.target: 一个 GUID 字符串，标识已注册类型库中的特定 UDT 类型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ComUdtElement" /> class with the specified GUID string.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 GUID 字符串初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ComUdtElement" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the readable type name.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置可读取的类型名称。

trans-unit.source: The readable type name.
trans-unit.target: 可读取的类型名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a GUID string that identifies the specific UDT type within the registered type library.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个 GUID 字符串，它标识已注册类型库中的特定 UDT 类型。

trans-unit.source: The specific UDT type within the registered type library.
trans-unit.target: 已注册类型库中的特定 UDT 类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a GUID string that identifies the registered type library that defines the type.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个 GUID 字符串，它标识定义该类型的已注册类型库。

trans-unit.source: The registered type library that defines the type.
trans-unit.target: 定义该类型的已注册类型库。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that identifies the type library version that defines the type.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个字符串，它标识定义该类型的类型库版本。

trans-unit.source: The type library version that defines the type.
trans-unit.target: 定义该类型的类型库版本。
